越.definition: to exceed; to climb over; to surpass; the more... the more

越俎代庖.definition: lit. to go beyond the sacrificial altar and take over the kitchen (idiom); fig. to exceed one's place and meddle in other people's affairs; to take matters into one's own hands

越僑.definition: Vietnamese resident in other countries (including in China)

越光米.definition: Koshihikari rice (variety of rice popular in Japan)

越共.definition: Communist Party of Vietnam; Viet Cong

越冬.definition: to pass the winter; to overwinter; to live through the winter

越出界線.definition: to exceed; to overstep the limit

越南民主共和國.pinyin: Yue4 nan2 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
越南民主共和國.definition: Democratic Republic of Vietnam (aka North Vietnam), a country in Southeast Asia 1945-1976

越國.definition: Yue state; generic term for states in south China or southeast Asia at different historical periods

越城.definition: Yuecheng district of Shaoxing city 紹興市|绍兴市[Shao4 xing1 shi4], Zhejiang

越城區.definition: Yuecheng district of Shaoxing city 紹興市|绍兴市[Shao4 xing1 shi4], Zhejiang

越城嶺.definition: Yuecheng mountain range between south Hunan and Guangxi

越境.definition: to cross a border (usually illegally); to sneak in or out of a country

越幫越忙.definition: to be officious; to kibitz; to be meddlesome; to force one's help upon

越描越黑.definition: lit. the more you touch things up, the darker they get; fig. to only make matters worse

越權.definition: to go beyond one's authority; arrogation

越演越烈.definition: to be intensifying; to be getting worse and worse; to start to run rampant

越獄.definition: to break out of prison; to jailbreak (an iOS device etc)

越王勾踐.definition: King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸

越界.definition: to cross a border; to overstep a bound

越發.definition: increasingly; more and more; ever more; all the more

越禮.definition: to overstep etiquette; not to observe priorities

越秀.definition: Yuexiu District of Guangzhou City 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 Shi4], Guangdong

越秀區.definition: Yuexiu District of Guangzhou City 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 Shi4], Guangdong

越級.definition: to skip a grade; to bypass ranks; to go over the head of one's boss

越職.definition: to exceed one's authority; to go beyond the bounds of one's job

越西.definition: see 越西縣|越西县[Yue4xi1 Xian4]

越西縣.definition: Yuexi County in Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], Sichuan

越軌.definition: to run off the track; to step out of line; to overstep the bounds of propriety

越過.definition: to cross over; to transcend; to cover distance; to overcome; to rise above

越陷越深.definition: to fall deeper and deeper (in debt, in love etc)

越障.definition: to surmount obstacles; assault course for training troops

越飛.definition: Adolph Abramovich Joffe (1883-1927), Soviet and Comintern diplomat and spy in 1922-23 in Republican China
